nodes.text: Agreed, USA All the Way is trying to rile people up. Regarding the first post in the thread, 52% with a nearly 4 point margin of error doesn't qualify for a 'majority' or 'most.'

Well, actually if the remainder is split between those who favor a marriage amendement and those who have no oppinion, yeah, actually 52% regardless of the margin of error, is still definitatively a majority.
